text: The House of Lies is a 1916 American silent drama movie directed by William Desmond Taylor and starring Edna Goodrich, Juan de la Cruz, Kathleen Kirkham, Lucille Ward, Herbert Standing. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1916 drama movies Category:American silent movies Category:American drama movies Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by William Desmond Taylor
title: The House of Lies (1916 movie)
